name: Cube Puzzle
description:
Try to solve this famous puzzle formed by 3x3 faces.

First, you may want to scramble it, so there is an option to set the number of random moves.

It has very intuitive controls, you only have to drag the face with the left mouse button in the direction you want it to rotate. With the right mouse button you can rotate the cube. The middle mouse button is the zoom selector.

At last, there are some buttons to reset the configuration and the cube.

Enjoy it!
